replies.onlyOwner: This command is restricted, buddy! No fooling around, be a good boy.
replies.botPerm:
I, the bot, don't have the necessary permissions to run the {mention_command} command!
Required permissions: [{bot_perms}]
replies.userPerm:
You don't have the required permissions to use the {mention_command} command!
Required permissions: [{user_perms}]
replies.cooldown: -# **You've been blocked from using the {mention_command} command for spamming. You can use it again after <t:{expired_timestamp}:R>.**

setup.description: Register server settings in the database.

panel.description: Create a control panel for the radio player.

replies.success: AFK has been successfully activated on this server.
replies.doDeleteChannel: -# **To set up the panel in your chosen channel, make sure to select it. The channel <#{channel}> is currently set for the panel. If you want to delete it, click one of the buttons below.**
replies.noChannel: You must mention a text channel.
replies.deleteChannel: The channel was successfully removed from the database.

prefix.description: Set a custom prefix in the server's database.

replies.noChannelError: You must mention a voice channel or join one.
replies.noPlayerError: No player has been activated on this server. Please create a player.
replies.notMatchedVoice: Your voice channel does not match mine. Please join the voice channel I am in.
replies.success: AFK has been successfully activated on this server.

afk.description: Activate AFK mode for the server's voice channel.

replies.noChannelError: You must mention a voice channel or join one.
replies.noPlayerError: No player has been activated on this server. Please create a player.
replies.notMatchedVoice: Your voice channel does not match mine. Please join the voice channel I am in.
replies.success: The music player panel has been successfully set up in the {channel} channel.

replies.invalidUser:
This button is only for {author}, and you are not allowed to use it.
To use the buttons, it’s better to call the following command: "{mention_command}"
replies.noPlayerError: No player has been activated on this server. Please create a player.
replies.notMatchedVoice: Your voice channel does not match mine. Please join the voice channel I am in.
replies.success: The music player panel has been successfully set up in the {channel} channel.

embed.author: Bot Guide
embed.value1:
>>> Hi, I’m {username}.
I'm a fun and management bot that helps admins manage the server easily and helps members have fun and solve their issues.
embed.value2: >>> To see all my commands, you can click on the menu below and explore the commands based on the category you're interested in.

menu.noPlayerError: No player has been activated on this server. Please create a player.
menu.noChannelError: You need to join a voice channel.
menu.notMatchedVoice: Your voice channel does not match mine. Please join the voice channel I am in.
menu.noPermToView: I can't see the channel, so please give me the 'View Channel' permission.
menu.noPermToConnect: I can't join the channel, so please give me the 'Connect Channel' permission.
menu.userDeaf: You cannot use this feature while you're deafened.
menu.clientMute: Please unmute me first, then try again.
